home.title: Murtoo odeeffannoo irratti hundaa'e taasisuu
home.title-description: filannoo qabiinsa bishaanii sirrii ta'e gochuudhaaf dandeessisuu
home.title2-description: hawaasa horsiisee bultootaa odeeffannoo haala qilleensaa akka argatan taasisnee humneessuudhaan jiijjiirama qabatamaa nuti lafarratti fidaa jiru argachuu dandeessu
home.feature1-description: Kaartaa qunnamtii qabu/interactive ta'ee fi sadarkaa biyyoolessaa ilaaluudhaan eddoo haroon jiru hubadhaa. Misooma bu'uuraa irra odeeffannoo jiru argadhaa.
home.feature2-description: Amaloota ijoo naannoo fi hawaasa bakka bishaanii kanaa qoradhu.
home.feature3-description: Daataa qabxii bishaanii bal’aa argachuu, murtoo daataa irratti hundaa’e murteessuuf ho’aa fi rooba seenaa fi tilmaama haala qilleensaa waqtii fi waqtii gadi fayyadamuu.
home.feature4-description: karaa bishaan itti argattan barbaadaa; akeektuu/ mojuula agarsiistuu karaa malee haroowwan argachuun salphaa miti

monitoring.name: Maqaa
monitoring.median-depth-info: Waliigala ammaa sadarkaa bishaanii giddugaleessa waggaa bakka bishaanii ti
monitoring.good-m: Gadi fageenya gidduu galeessaa dhibbeentaa 100 ol.
monitoring.near-m: Gadi fageenya giduu galeessa dhibbeentaa 3 gad.
monitoring.placeholder-search: Qabxii bishaanii, aanaa, zoonii ykn naannootiin barbaadi
monitoring.modal-body: Profaayilli haroo afaan filatameen hin argamu, qofa keessatti argama
monitoring.modal-continue: Gara piroofaayilii haroo sanaatti itti fufaa
monitoring.alert-route: Bakka jalqabaa fi haroo gidduutti karaa argachuu hin dandeenye.
monitoring.warning-permission: Bakka amma jirtan irraa gara haroo sanaa deemuu yoo barbaaddan, maaloo bakka biraawzari keessan jiru nuuf hayyamaa.
monitoring.warning-position: Dhiifama, garuu yeroo ammaa kana odeeffannoo bakka jirtu argachuun hin danda'amu
monitoring.warning-timeout: Dhiifama, bakka jirtan argachuuf yaaluun yeroon nu jalaa dhume
monitoring.warning-browser: Geolocation browser kana keessatti hin argamu. Maaloo bakka jalqabaa bakka adda ta’e irraa filachuu yaadaa.
monitoring.subscription-info: Miseensummaaf galmaa'ii amma. Ragaa haala bishaani argachuuf fi akkaataa odeefannoon itti si dhaqqabuu danda'uu filadhu. Odeeffannoo ariifataa haal qabiyyee bishaanii 'Email' n yeroo gabaabaa keessatti argachuu fi jijjirama haala qabiyyee bishaani torbanitti argachuu keessaa filadhu.

profile.notFound-d: Agarsiisa qabxiiwwan bishaanii irraa piroofaayilii argachuuf yaali
profile.toast-body: Profaayilli haroo afaan filatameen hin argamu

data.monitored-d: Chaartiiwwan garaagaraa gadi fageenya madda bishaanii, iskeelii gadi fageenyaa, roobaa fi hurka biqiltootaa fi lafa irraa ka'u hubadhaa. Giraafota baroota filattanii  baasuudhaan muuxannoo keessan waliin fayyadamaa.
data.depth-description: Giraafin kun gadi fageenya qabxii bishaanii fi haala qilleensaa agarsiisu
data.scaled-description: Giraafin kun gadi fageenya qabxii bishaanii fi haala qilleensaa walgitu agarsiisu
data.rain-description: Giraafin kun qabxii bishaanii roobaafi haala qilleensaa agarsiisu
data.evap-description: Giraafin kun danfaa bishaanii fi haala qilleensaa agarsiisu
data.subseasonal: Raaga haala qilleensaa yeroo gabaabaa (waqtii gadii)
data.subseasonal-d: Raagni haala qilleensaa dhibbeentaa carraa roobaa idilee eddoo tokkoo baatii adda ba'e tokkoon walbira qabuun kennama. Armaan gaditti carraa roobaa idilee, idilee-gadii fi idilee-olii keessaa isa kamtu carraa guddaa akka qabu godina barbaaddan sanaaf argachuu dandeessu.
data.forecast-3: Raagni haala qilleensaa irraa caalan jiidhi lafaa kan bokkaa/rooba agarsiisa.
data.seasonal-d: Raagni haala qilleensaa carraa roobaa dhibbeentaa carraa rooba eddoo tokkoo ji'oota murtaa'eef idileen wal bira qabuun kennama. Armaan gaditti raaga haala qelleensaa godina filatamee kanaa argattu
data.notFound-d: Odeeffannoo fuula agarsiisa qabxiiwwan bishaanii irraa argachuuf yaali.
data.loading: Dataa miiidhaa qorannoo afaanii ittisuuf dhihoo

notFound.title: Oops! Naannoo hin beekamne keessa waan deemte fakkaata.
notFound.description: Fuulli barbaaddan kaartaa dijitaalaa keenya irratti argamuu hin dandeenye.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description-1: Ethiopian Institute of Agricultural Research is one of the oldest and largest agricultural research institutes in Africa. EIAR was established in 1966 by Proclamation. It was then called Institute of Agricultural Research (IAR). In 1997 was renamed as Ethiopian Agricultural Research Organization (EARO). At the moment the institute is named as Ethiopian Institute Agricultural Research (EIAR). EIAR has 23 research centers located in various agro-ecologies of the country . These research centers are endowed with research setups that make them conducive and preferable for research endeavors. The headquarter of EIAR is located in the capital Addis Ababa.
aboutUs.description-2: EIAR made tremendous efforts to build the national capacity of doing agricultural research, produce, and introduce improved technologies focusing on fostering agricultural growth and development in the country. As a result, over the last four decades, the release of improved technologies in crop, livestock, soils and water, forestry and agricultural mechanization have increased dramatically. To date, the contribution of improved agricultural technologies generated and introduced by EIAR has become fundamental in the national economy.
aboutUs.description-3: EIAR is doing its level best to introduce and generate agricultural technologies while also contributing to meet the national demands of transforming Ethiopian agriculture.
aboutUs.vision-d: EIAR inspires to see improved livelihood of all Ethiopians engaged in agriculture, agro-pastoralism, and pastoralism through market competitive agricultural technologies
aboutUs.mission-d: EIAR has a mission to conduct research that will provide market competitive agricultural technologies that will contribute to increased agricultural productivity and nutrition quality, sustainable food security, economic development, and conservation of the integrity of natural resources and the environment.
aboutUs.core-values-d: EIAR sustains the commitments included in the following set of core values:

privacy.title: Icciti Dhuunfaa
privacy.description-1: Nuti bakka bu'oota garee qorannoo sagantaa jijjirama qilleensa dhaabbilee 'Alliance Bioversity International and CIAT'  fi 'Ethiopian Agricultural Research Institute' ti. Gareen tuni ummata dhaattuu haroo tanaa jiraatan irratti qorannoo geggeessaa jirti. Kaayon pirojektichaa Itiyoophiyaa keessatti rakkoolee ummata dhaattuu haroo tanaa jiraatan qunnamaa jiruuf fala ammayyaawaa dhiyeessuu ta'a. Qorannoon tuni fala ammayyaawaa kan akka dhaamsa barruu gabaabaa 'SMS', 'E-mail' dhiheessuf ummata kana irraa waa'ee haroo tanaa ragaa sassaabuu barbaaddi.
privacy.description-2: Ati, akka jiraataa ykn jiraattuu lafa tanaatti, kaayoo qorannoo tana keessatti akka hirmaattu dhimmoota armaan gadiitif filatamtee jirta.
privacy.description-3: Sababni odeeffannoon kuni sassaabamuuf ragaa kana kuufama ragaa keessaa galchuudhaan yeroo barbaachisaa ta'etti haala qilleensaa akkaataa itti fufiinsa qabuun isiniff erguufi. Kana akkanatti beeksisuun dansaadha.
privacy.description-3-1: Odeeffannoon sassaabamu cuftinuu iccitiidhaan kan eegamu tahee kan xiinxilamuu qorattoota dhaabbata 'Alliance Bioversity International and CIAT' fi dhaabbata  'Ethiopian Agricultural Research Institute' qofaan taha. Barbaachisummaa iccitii eeguu irraa kan ka'e, qorannoo tana keessatti ado eenyummaa kankee ofi hin saaxille hirmaachuun sodaa waliif qoodinsa muuxannoo fi dinqisifannaa sagantaa madaalamuuf tahu kan hanbisu ta'a.  Iccitii eeguun dabalataan kani mirkaneessu  hirmaannaa waliif qoodinsa hubannoo fi muuxannoo sirna hordoffii bishaan beeladaa irraa argachuu malee balaa kamiyyuuf si hin saaxilu.
privacy.description-3-2: Qorannoon tuni iccitii eenyummaa keetii xiyyeffannaa cimaan kan eeydu yommuu tahu ragaan argamu cuftinuu iccitiidhaan kan kuufamu ta'a. Qorattoota dhaabbatichaa qofatu mirga ilaaluu ragaa kanaa qabaata. Haala kamiinu eenyummaa namaa in saaxilamu. Qorannoo tanaan wal-qabatee akkaataa ragaan isinirraa funaaname itti eegame/qabame irratti gaafii yooni qabaattan hooganaa pirojeekti kan ta'an Aabba Sintayehu Alemayehu              'e-msil' isaani  s.alemayehu@cgiar.org  irratti gaafachuu dandeessu.
privacy.description-3-3: Odeeffannoon ati kennitu cuftinuu dhimma qorannoo kanaa qofaaf kan itti fayyadamnu ta'a.
privacy.description-3-4: Yeroo barbaachisaa ta'etti adeemsa odeeffannoo sassaabuu kana keessaa ofi baasuu ykn  odeeffannoo kennuu irraa ofi-qabuu ni dandeessu.
privacy.description-3-5: Waan ciccimoo gabaafamuu qaban kani hirmaattonni adeemsa qorannoo tana keessatti jedhan gabaasa argama qorannoo tanaa keessattii fi ykn maxxansa qorannoo tanaa keessatti kan fayyadamnu yommuu ta'u waliigaltee jalqaba irratti nama odeeffannoo gaafatamu waliin taasifamu irratti kan hundaa'u ta'a.
privacy.description-3-6: Yeroo gaafii fi deebisaan geggeeffamu maqaa, bilbila, 'e-mail' fi fulaa jireenya keetii kan sassaabamu taha. Sababni kuni taheefis - gaafii fi deebiin kan taasifamu lafa fagoo irraa waan taheef.
privacy.description-3-7: Waliigaltee tana mallatteessinaan ykn fudhannaan kaayon qorannoo tana akka sitti himamee hubattee fi waan armaan olitti tuqame hunda irratti waliigaluu kankee mirkaneessaa qorannoo tana keessatti hirmaachuuf fedhii qabaachuu kankee mirkaneessa.

user-profile.no-subscription: At the moment you dont have subscriptions

advisories.title: Gorsoota
advisories.status-d: Sadarkaalen qabiyyee bishaanii kan ammaa akka armaan gadi kana:
advisories.description-1: Gorsootni odeeffannoo dhaamsan qophaa'ee ta'ee fayyadamtootaaf  tajaajila 'SMS' tiin kan ergamu. Kaayoon gorsootaa inni guddaan haala jijjirama qabiyyee bishaanii fayyadamtoota bishaanitiff odeeffannoo dabarsuudha. Odeeffannoo bal'aa ta'e kan fulaa/madda bishaanii cufa hammate dhiyeessuudhaan, gorsootni haala qilleensaa fayyadamtootni murtii odeeffannoo irratti hundaa'e yeroo sirritti akka murteessan isaan dandeessisa. Akeekkachiisa ofi-eeggannoo irraa jalqabee hanga agarsiistuu hanqina/fooqqacha bishaani kan waqtii, gorsootni kuni haala qabiyyee bishaanii fulaa sanii hubannoo ifa ta'e fayyadamtootaaf kennuudhaan haala qabatamaaf ofi qopheessuudhaan deebii/fala sirrii ta'e akka fudhatan kan isaan jajjabeessu ta'a.
advisories.description-2: Gorsoota 'SMS' tin dabarsuu hojii irra oolchuun finna bishaani keessatti iftoominaa fi wal-qunnamtii dansaa uumuudhaaf  tarkaanfi guddaa fuuldura deemmaa agarsiisa. Akeekkachiisa kana kallattiidhaan moobaayili irratti argachuudhaan, fayyadamtooti   haala jijjirama qabiyyee bishaanii fulaa kamiiyyuu taa'anii odeeffannoo argachuu danda'an.  Qunnamtiin kallattii fi ariifatan kuni hubannoo qabeenya bishaaniikan cimsuu ta'ee fayyadamtoonni qusannaa fi itti gaafatamummaan akka fayyadaman  kan jajjabeessu ta'a.
advisories.description-3: Xumura irratti, gorsoota dabarsuu jalqabuun hubannoo fayyadamtoota cimsuudhaan cinaatti dandeettii murtii kenniinsa fayyadamtootaa tan hubannoo irratti hundaa'ee fi kan tarsimaawaa ta'e waa'ee finna bishaanii keessatti akka murteessan isan jajjabeessa.  Haala qabiyyee bishaanii haroo cufaati fi ergaa qabiyyeen bishaanii agarsiiftu hubachuudhaan, fayyadamtoonni  murtee fooyya'aa hooggansaa fi qusannaa bishaanitiif isaan gargaaru dursanii murteesudhaan qabeenya murteessaa kanaan fayyadamuu danda'an. Gabaabinatti, gorsi waa'ee madda/fulaa bishaanii meeshaa barbaachisa finna bishaanii kan bakka bu'u yommu ta'u finna itti fufiinsa fi qabeenya xiqqaadhaan fidamuu fi mirkaneessummaa itti fayyadama walqixxummaa fi wal-dhabiinsa iraa bilisa ta'e dhaloota dhufuuf uumuu kan jajjabeessu ta'a.
advisories.good-message: Haroon haala dansaa irra jirti. Finna itti fayyadama bishaanii kan dhimma dhibii irratti xiyyeeffadhu.
advisories.watch-message: Haroon haala xiyyeeffannaa barbaadu irra jirti. Itti fayyadama bishaan haroo tanaa dhimma dhibiif fayyadamuu diqqeessi, ajaja Abbaa Herregaa hordofi/kabaji.
advisories.alert-message: Haroon haala akeekkachiisa bishaan gadi bu'uu irra jirti. Itti fayyadama bishaan haroo tanaa dhugaatii namaati fi dhugaatii horii dadhabaa qofaaf oolch.
advisories.near-dry-message: Haroon fooqqachuuf dhiyaattee jirti kanaafuu bishaan haroo tanaa dhugaatii namaa qofaaf itti fayyadami.
advisories.seasonal-dry-message: Haroon fooqqattee jirti. Kanaafuu haroo dhibii dhaattuu jirtuu tan bishaan qabdu odeeffanno/daa'imtuu argachuuf '' Ponds  jedhii 'SMS'n ergi.
